name: Watching Delusion
description: Watching Delusion is a grotesque puzzle game where you have to open all of the "eyes" on the map.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or higher Processor: Intel Pentium 4 Series Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: CPU-integrated or on-board graphics DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 50 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound card
